entry.title: libconsensus and bitcoin development process
entry.summary: To enable communication between a library and node, a library similar to 'git pull' is needed. SPV libraries like bitcoinj know how to build a block locator, request blocks forward from the common branch point and handle re-orgs by downloading data from a full node. If people are recommended to use bitcoinj to build extra indexes, it is ideal as it can calculate a UTXO set indexed by address.
